TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_lazuli
inventory=[{"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 17, "index": 30}, {"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 57, "index": 38}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 8, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft lapis_lazuli, I need to smelt the lapis_ore at slot 14 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 14 to slot 11 with quantity 1
